mapper.update:
UPDATE userQuestion
id = #{id},
quesId = #{quesId},
questionId = #{questionId},
result = #{result},
remark = #{remark},
status = #{status},
userId = #{userId},
addDate = #{addDate},
addIp = #{addIp},
addUser = #{addUser},
modifyDate = #{modifyDate},
modifyIp = #{modifyIp},
modifyUser = #{modifyUser},
WHERE id = #{id}
AND modified = #{original}
